website_summaries.verdict: Durable, supportive pick for versatile wear.
pros: Closed heel provides more warmth than open-back styles
Suede upper with Tasman braid collar
cons: May run small, so consider ordering a size up

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and comfy. Fits a Little Snug.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased one too many Ugg boots (classic and tall) in the same size (women's 7). The boots fit so nicely to begin with, but then with use start to get a little loose. These moccasins however are starting off snug. Its difficult to get my foot all the way in the shoe so my heel does not hang off the back. I am hoping that with use it will get easier to get on. Of course they are super comfortable and warm once my foot is all in the way in. I just wish they made half sizes!
customer_reviews.author: KLP

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute and comfy. They don’t really have arch support, but the fur will still be fluffy under the arch even after wearing them a lot. The other fur will become flat after wearing them but they are still really comfy. Make sure you spray them before you wear them otherwise they will get dirty. I really like them
customer_reviews.author: MomOfSix

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!😊
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is awesome🤗🤗Amazon never disappoints me and especially because when I'm ordering for myself my home or my family I'm not at all disappointed,these uggs are for my 10 yr old twins which my kiddos say are very soft and comfortabl,so I figured why not get my hubby a pair as well..HAPPY WIFE HAPPY LIFE😌And nice slippers he said(my husband),of course the comfort is what he enjoys most, I must say thanks to Amazon and our amazing delivery service people !!!!!👍
customer_reviews.author: markeyta ward

customer_reviews.title: its an amazing shoe.
customer_reviews.text: SOOOOO comfy!!!! I was very shocked these fit a tad weird though. I am a 5 in adults and wanted to not spend so much so I got the kids size instead (size 3) and normally that is my go to kid size, but this one felt a little off. But other than that, its an amazing shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bhagya H

customer_reviews.title: Truly Indoor/Outdoor, Great for Late Pregnancy (when you need warm slip ons!)
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I am a women's 6 and bought a kids 5 (they are perfectly fit to my foot, not too tight but no room to slip around). I threw some suede protector on them and was able to wear them outside in light, wet snow today. I had great traction on the wet ground, the wool kept my feet warm, and they still look brand new. I am pregnant and due in three weeks, so these help so much with avoiding struggling to put warm boots on and take them off. I highly recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased a pair that needed to be returned to another vendor. The size I needed was not in stock so I looked for another vendor and found Robert Wayne. I have an adult pair of Uggs. The decorative edging doesn't match on the kids pair I purchased. Also, the back of the slipper does not com up as high. They may be real but of second rate quality. Buyer beware as they are priced the same as authentic Uggs. It did come in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie jacovini

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great? Fast shipping, and they’re very comfortable. I have fairly small feet, I wear a 4-5 in women’s so I figured buying the kids sizes would be a better, cheaper, option. Sadly a 5 was still a bit loose for my liking. I think a 4 would be too tight. I would love to keep these and wear them, but they’re just too big for my liking .
customer_reviews.author: Kehonestii

customer_reviews.title: BOGUS NON-AUTHENTIC UGGS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item based on advertisement of "Authentic UGGS" Slippers They are NOT authentic and it was obvious just to solidify my findings, I brought them into an official UGG store, where the GM verified that the slippers were Bogus! They are being returned for a full refund! Future buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Disapointed

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and wonderful seller!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable. At first they fit a little snug but will fit true to size very quickly. I’ve purchased from this seller more than one time and am very pleased with the seller as well as the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my wife's favorite foot wear aroiund the house and sometimes outdoors. They're well made and look good. She would recommend them for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Knaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these slide on uggs. They are warm, color is perfect and they don't slip off like other slipper like shoes. Great for going to basketball and changing into his sneakers at the court.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these so comfortable I’m a women’s 8 normally and I purchased kids size 6 and they fit perfectly. Price was great. If you are wondering wether to buy or not buy I suggest absolutely going for it. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Kjade

customer_reviews.title: Ugg!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and had to return them due to them running very small. I re-ordered the next size, but those as well needed to be returned due to them being too small. I suggest you size up by 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Chinchilla

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Seems fake doesn’t have the R sign behind “UGG”. Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Fake uggs
customer_reviews.text: These are fake !! The ones on the right are the ones I received from amazon and the ones on the left are from the ugg store. You can automatically tell the difference in the stitching , material , the pattern. Everything is off.
customer_reviews.author: Justey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor/outdoor slipper. I wear a women's 7.5 and bought the big kids size 6 and fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: LBM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and overall great!!
customer_reviews.text: I got them and they were somewhat small but I walked around my house and they broke in very fast. They’re super comfy and warm and I highly recommend them. Also they are a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Moore

customer_reviews.title: My favorite slippers!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, my favorite slippers ever! Comfortable, durable, and cute. Insider's secret - big kid's size 7 fits women's 8.5 - 9, saves $30!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My heel is right at the edge which has a lip so I feel my heel slipping out if I don’t dig my foot in enough... but otherwise I love these. Maybe a tad small but once the fur wears down I’m assuming will fit normal.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I wear a size 4 1/2 woman’s size which is very hard to find. The children’s size 3 fits me perfectly. They are very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela S Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd pair!  Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third pair because I love them. My first pair was also loved by a family of mice in my garage so they won! My second pair is my outdoor pair and this new pair is just for the house. Perfect fit and they last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm, well made
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. I ordered a size up and fit is perfect. Holding up really well, worn daily.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfy right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, love these for my ten year old. Size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy and fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks so cute and very warm and fit perfectly to my son i loooove it and he looks so cute with it I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Big kids Uggs
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7.5 in womens vans and I bought a size 6 in big kids! They fit just right and they are not tight.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit fakes!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! These are counterfeit Uggs. No trademark, wrong soles, and incorrect sizing. I sent them right back.
customer_reviews.author: c.

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these back because they were too small, but otherwise they are cute and everything I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my six year old.
customer_reviews.text: I went up two sizes so it fits with socks too. Got these for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Fake UGGs
customer_reviews.text: These UGGs are not authentic. The soles are completely different from the original Tasman slippers. It’s like someone threw their fake pair in a box and shipped them. There was no stickers at sole, no paperwork and no original packaging. Disappointed but I shouldn't be since I only paid $70.
customer_reviews.author: SalihaF

customer_reviews.title: Very nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson loves these slippers I ordered a size up, so he’d get some good wear out of them. Fit well I’d purchase again
customer_reviews.author: LisaW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Loved size 7 woman’s and always buy the kids. Love my Uggs
customer_reviews.author: JanePier

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed and dissatisfied with this particular UGG product. I got them at the end of September and it’s now December and both slippers are separated from the sole on the very front of the slipper. They were only worn indoors.So it’s ugh on these UGG’s
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 5 grade school in nikes I got these in a size 4
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Youth size 6 = women’s size 7
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I am a women’s size 7. My running shoes are 7.5 Nike. The youth size 6 in these UGGS is perfect! Great way to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Daughter and grandson happy with Christmas present.....
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his new Ugg slippers. My daughter is happy also, because now he is not wearing hers.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: My favorite slippers
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable and comfortable! I get a new pair every two years and they are my favorite
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, I wear with my jeans and it's nice and soft, the fur is very thick. Keeps my feet warm

customer_reviews.title: Super soft comfy slippers.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9 yr old son. He loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly Fake
customer_reviews.text: They do not have the trademark ® after the word UGG like the ones pictured in the advertisement. I returned them for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed. So cute and super comfy ugg slippers! I love them so much o wear them all winter/spring and fall!

customer_reviews.title: Ugg slippers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage daughter she wears them everyday!

customer_reviews.title: Best UGG slippers
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for Christmas and she loves them! Wears them everyday!

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I received a counterfeit pair of uggs. Synthetic fur fiber and no ® symbol on the logo. Do not buy, they are worth maybe 15$

customer_reviews.title: I really like the quality of the shoe and very pleased with ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the shoe and very pleased with my purchase. Considering ordering in different color.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them. They were a Christmas gift for her.

customer_reviews.text: Have this clogs in every color, very confortable and warm!!

customer_reviews.text: I love how comfy it is just what I need it.

customer_reviews.title: Love the slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers, I’ve bought these before and they lasted me 3 years

customer_reviews.title: Great Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a xmas gift for my wife. She loves them

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these slippers for my sophomore college kid as a Christmas gift. She loves them!

customer_reviews.text: this ugg product was exellent in every way possible and when Imean every way I mean every way

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these , super cute , and fits perfectly

customer_reviews.text: My daughter is happy we always order a size up with uggs.

customer_reviews.text: These slippers are super soft and comfortable. Wear them all the time.

customer_reviews.text: I am a ladies 7/7.5 bought a kids 5 perfect fit super comfy -

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters Loved These Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair of these, one for a young grandchild and one for a teen grandchild. They both loved them, the fit was true to size!

customer_reviews.title: She is in love with them
customer_reviews.text: Brought for daughters pregnant feet. She is in love with them.

customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my son and he loves them because now he can just put those on when he needs to just run out.
customer_reviews.author: shanice

customer_reviews.title: Sizing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a true women’s 7.5 and the big kid’s 5 fits me better than the women’s 7 or 8. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent by
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect exactly what I thought they would be my grandchildren love them with them all the time

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were not new
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were obviously worn, with dirty bottoms. Package was taped together. Not what I expected for buying “new” shoes.

customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! They are warm and fit comfortable

product_meta.title: UGG Kids' Tasman II Slipper
feature_bullets: Be ready for a sleepover with the Tasman II slipper!

UGGpure™ wool lining. UGGpure™ wool footbed. Treadlite by UGG™ synthetic outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 6 oz Product measurements were taken using size 13 Little Kid, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
